description: This Java class defines a REST controller in a Spring Boot application. It provides basic informational endpoints such as a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: InfoController
classes.description: Provides basic endpoints for backend info, health check, and documentation redirection.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a greeting message indicating the service is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the user to the Swagger UI page, preserving original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a simple health status check.
